layouts.name: Bottom Action Pills
layouts.notes: Instance node; requires component definition for layout properties

limitations: MCP get_code returns Tailwind classes for some nodes only
Frame-level auto-layout properties (primaryAxisAlignItems, counterAxisAlignItems) not explicitly exposed
Constraints (left/right/top/bottom, scale/fixed) not returned via MCP
Instance nodes require parent component inspection
Gaps and padding calculated manually from child positions in get_metadata
recommendation:
Use Figma REST API GET /v1/files/:file_key/nodes?ids=... to retrieve:
- layoutMode (HORIZONTAL/VERTICAL/NONE)
- primaryAxisAlignItems (MIN/CENTER/MAX/SPACE_BETWEEN)
- counterAxisAlignItems (MIN/CENTER/MAX)
- itemSpacing (gap)
- paddingLeft/Right/Top/Bottom
- layoutGrow (0=fixed, 1=fill)
- constraints object
